mapper.select: SELECT aug.groupid, aug.userid, au.`name`, auo.organizationid, au.islock FROM new_app_user_group aug LEFT JOIN new_app_user au ON aug.userid = au.id LEFT JOIN new_app_user_organization auo ON auo.userid = au.id LEFT JOIN new_app_organization ao ON auo.organizationid = ao.id where aug.groupid = #{groupid}
SELECT aug.*, ag.`name` as groupName FROM new_app_user_group aug LEFT JOIN new_app_group ag ON aug.groupid = ag.id WHERE aug.userid = #{userid}
